attacks.name: Split Spiral Punch
attacks.effect: Your opponent’s Active Pokémon is now Confused.

attacks.name: Enraged Strike
attacks.effect: If your opponent’s Active Pokémon is Confused, this attack does 80 more damage.

attacks.name: Familial Combo GX
attacks.effect: Draw 5 cards. (You can’t use more than 1 GX attack in a game.)
